#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int gcd(int a,int b)
{
if(b==0)
  return a;
else
  return gcd(b,a%b);
}

int main()
{
int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
int m,n,count;
cin>>n>>m;
if(n==1)
  count=m;
else if(m==1)
       count=n;
     else
       count=gcd(m-1,n-1)+1;
cout<<count<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
